data.message:
Dear Rob I wrote but you still ain't calling
I even put a picture of William's memorial plaque at the bottom

I sent two emails but you must not-a got em

Maybe you're on lunch or just forgotten 

Sometimes I mistype addresses when I jot em

There's probably a problem with your server or somethin'

But anyway how's your Tesco branded bottled water

My girlfriend got me a present I'm about to be a father

She got me a worm guess what I'm gunna call him 

I'll name him William 

I heard about your share prices too I'm sorry 

I blame the the EU, I had a friend who voted out and didn't want in

I know you probably hear this 
every day

But I'm your biggest fan 

I even got a tin of your old 
school Tesco spam

I got a room full of your leaflets and your bags for life man 

I even liked the bags before they were 5p, those bags were fat

Anyway I hope you get this man, hit me back 
Just to chat, truly yours, your biggest fan 
Wes The Worm Man

----------------------

Dear Rob you still ain't called or wrote, 

I hope you get chance
I ain't mad I just think it's messed up you don't answer fans

If you don't want to talk to me you don't have to

Just send me the damn gift card like I asked you

That's for William man who's now 6inch under

Laying in the ground in the rain and thunder 

That's messed up man, he would've wanted to be just like you

You would have been his idol, he'd have liked you more than I do

I ain't mad tho I just don't like being lied to

Remember when we met here you said we'd hook up and grab a beer 

See I'm just like you in a way, I didn't really know William either

For all we know the 'HE' we named might have even been a Sheila

I can relate to what you're saying on your post

Sometimes I read through them while munching on cucumber on toast 

Now William's gone that stuff helps me when I'm depressed

I've even thought about having a Tesco tattoo on my chest 

Sometimes I like to cut open Tesco Extra Special cheese

Mixing it with a cucumber is such an adrenalin rush for me

See everything you say is real and I respect you because you say it

My girlfriend is jealous because I talk about you and Will 24/7

But no one knows you like I do Rob, no one does

You gotta message me man
I'll be the biggest fan you ever lose 
Sincerely yours Wes The Worm Man
P.S we should share a cucumber sandwich together too

-----------------------

Dear Mr I'm too good to call or message The Worm Man

This will be the last message I'll ever send your ass

It's been six minutes and still no word, I don't deserve it?

I know you got my last two messages, the read receipts came through perfect

So this is the last message I'm sending you, I hope you hear it

I'm in the car right now, I'm doing 90 on the M1

Hey Rob, I'm on Sainsburys click n collect dare me to drive? 

All I wanted was a lousy letter and my gift card 

I hope you know I've put all my bags for life in the trash in my yard

I love you Rob, we could have done more virals together think about it

You've ruined it now, I hope you see me on every news feed while you can only dream about it 

I hope your conscience eats at you and you can't breath without me

See Rob, stop wiggling worm I'm trying to talk

Hey Rob, that's my new worm I have in the trunk 

But I didn't wrap him in cellophane, I just tied him up

See I ain't like you, suffocating worms is something that I would never do

Well I gotta go, I gotta find a Sainsburys somehow

Oh wait, how am I gunna get that gift card now...

#WilliamTheWorm #JusticeForWilliam #SongsForWilliam #Eminem
